00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief PS/2 keyboard driver.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_keyboard.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_keyboard(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input           clk_30,
00035     input           reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name On-Screen-Display management interface

00039     //% @{
00040     output reg      request_osd,
00041     input           enable_joystick_1,
00042     //% @}
00043     
00044     //% \name drv_keyboard interface

00045     //% @{
00046     input           keyboard_ready,
00047     output          keyboard_event,
00048     output [7:0]    keyboard_scancode,
00049     
00050     // joystick on port 1
00051     output reg      joystick_1_up,
00052     output reg      joystick_1_down,
00053     output reg      joystick_1_left,
00054     output reg      joystick_1_right,
00055     output reg      joystick_1_fire,
00056     //% @}
00057     
00058     //% \name PS/2 keyboard hardware interface

00059     //% @{
00060     inout           ps2_kbclk,
00061     inout           ps2_kbdat
00062     //% @}
00063 );
00064 
00065 /*
00066 
00067 PS/2 Protocol:
00068 ********************************************************************************
00069 (Data, Clock)
00070 Idle:       (1'bZ, 1'bZ)
00071 Inhibit:    (1'bZ, 1'b0)
00072 Request:    (1'b0, 1'bZ)
00073 
00074 Device to Host:
00075 if(last_clock == 1'b1 && clock == 1'b0) Read data
00076 Data frame: 0, 8 data bits LSB first, odd parity, 1
00077 
00078 Host to Device:
00079 State: Inhibit for 100 microseconds,                        Clock <= 1'b0
00080 State: Request                                              Data <= 1'b0
00081 if(last_clock == 1'b1 && clock == 1'b0) Write data          Data <= bit
00082 Data frame: 0, 8 data bits, odd parity
00083 if(last_clock == 1'b1 && clock == 1'b0) Release data
00084 if(last_clock == 1'b1 && clock == 1'b0) Read data acknowlege (0)
00085 Wait for Idle
00086 
00087 Keyboard:
00088 ********************************************************************************
00089 Power-on:
00090 Keyboard: 0xAA (BAT OK) or 0xFC (Error)
00091 
00092 Make and break code:
00093 Keyboard: 0x12 (Shift make code)
00094 Keyboard: 0xF0 (Shift break code 1)
00095 Keyboard: 0x12 (Shift break code 2)
00096 
00097 Errors:
00098 Keyboard: 0xFE (Resend)
00099 
00100 Set LEDs:
00101 Host: 0xED
00102 Keyboard: 0xFA (Aknowlege)
00103 Host: 0,0,0,0,0, Caps Lock, Num Lock, Scroll Lock
00104 Keyboard: 0xFA (Aknowlege)
00105 
00106 
00107 Mouse:
00108 ********************************************************************************
00109 Power-on:
00110 Mouse: 0xAA (BAT OK) or 0xFC (Error)
00111 Mouse: 0x00 (ID)
00112 
00113 Enable reporting:
00114 Host: 0xF4 (Enable Data Reporting)
00115 Mouse: 0xFA (Aknowlege)
00116 
00117 Report:
00118 Mouse: Y overflow, X overflow, Y sign, X sign, 1, Middle, Right, Left
00119 Mouse: X movement
00120 Mouse: Y movement
00121 
00122 Errors:
00123 Mouse: 0xFE (Resend) or 0xFC (Error)
00124 Host: 0xFE (Resend) or 0xFC (Error)
00125 
00126 ********************************************************************************
00127 
00128 */
00129 
00130 // ---------------- DEBUG
00131 /*
00132 wire debug_write;
00133 assign debug_write =    (new_ps2 == 1'b0 && amiga_new == 1'b0 && cnt_counter == 16'd0 && amiga_avail > 4'd0);
00134 
00135 reg [7:0] debug_addr;
00136 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00137     if(reset_n == 1'b0)                                     debug_addr <= 8'd0;
00138     else if(debug_write == 1'b1 && debug_addr < 8'd255)     debug_addr <= debug_addr + 8'd1;
00139 end
00140 
00141 altsyncram debug_ram_inst(
00142     .clock0(clk_30),
00143 
00144     .address_a(debug_addr),
00145     .wren_a(debug_write == 1'b1),
00146     .data_a(amiga_keycodes[95:88]),
00147     .q_a()
00148 );
00149 defparam 
00150     debug_ram_inst.operation_mode = "SINGLE_PORT",
00151     debug_ram_inst.width_a = 8,
00152     debug_ram_inst.lpm_hint = "ENABLE_RUNTIME_MOD=YES,INSTANCE_NAME=kb",
00153     debug_ram_inst.widthad_a = 8;
00154 */
00155 //--------------------- DEBUG
00156 
00157 
00158 // caps lock bit7: 0 - turn on light, 1 - turn off light
00159 // 6-5-4-3-2-1-0-7
00160 // Make Pause, no break pause: { 8'hE1, 8'h14, 8'h77, 8'hE1, 8'hF0, 8'h14, 8'hF0, 8'h77 }
00161 
00162 
00163 assign ps2_kbclk = 1'bZ;
00164 assign ps2_kbdat = 1'bZ;
00165 
00166 reg [15:0] mv;
00167 reg mv_wait;
00168 reg was_ps2_kbclk;
00169 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00170     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00171         mv              <= 16'd0;
00172         mv_wait         <= 1'b0;
00173         was_ps2_kbclk   <= 1'b0;
00174     end
00175     else begin
00176         mv <= { mv[14:0], ps2_kbclk };
00177     
00178         if(mv_wait == 1'b0 && mv[15:12] == 4'b1111 && mv[3:0] == 4'b0000) begin
00179             was_ps2_kbclk <= 1'b1;
00180             mv_wait <= 1'b1;
00181         end
00182         else if(mv_wait == 1'b1 && mv[15:0] == 16'h0000) begin
00183             mv_wait <= 1'b0;
00184             was_ps2_kbclk <= 1'b0;
00185         end
00186         else begin
00187             was_ps2_kbclk <= 1'b0;
00188         end
00189     end
00190 end
00191 
00192 wire new_ps2;
00193 assign new_ps2 = (was_ps2_kbclk == 1'b1 && kbdat_counter == 4'd10 && kbdat[0] == 1'b0 && ps2_kbdat == 1'b1 && kbdat_parity == 1'b1);
00194 
00195 reg [9:0] kbdat;
00196 reg [3:0] kbdat_counter;
00197 reg [23:0] timeout;
00198 reg kbdat_parity;
00199 
00200 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00201     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00202         kbdat           <= 10'd0;
00203         kbdat_counter   <= 4'd0;
00204         kbdat_parity    <= 1'b0;
00205         timeout         <= 24'd0;
00206     end
00207     else begin
00208     
00209         if(kbdat_counter != 4'd0 && timeout != 24'hFFFFFF)  timeout <= timeout + 24'd1;
00210         else if(kbdat_counter == 4'd0)                      timeout <= 24'd0;
00211         
00212         if(was_ps2_kbclk == 1'b1) begin
00213             kbdat <= { ps2_kbdat, kbdat[9:1] };
00214             
00215             if(kbdat_counter == 4'd10) begin
00216                 kbdat_counter <= 4'd0;
00217             end
00218             else begin
00219                 kbdat_counter <= kbdat_counter + 4'd1;
00220                 if(kbdat_counter == 4'd0)   kbdat_parity <= 1'b0;
00221                 else if(ps2_kbdat == 1'b1)  kbdat_parity <= !kbdat_parity;
00222             end
00223         end
00224         else if(timeout == 24'hFFFFFF) begin
00225             kbdat_counter <= 4'd0;
00226         end
00227     end
00228 end
00229 
00230 wire pressed;
00231 altsyncram pressed_code_inst(
00232     .clock0(clk_30),
00233 
00234     .address_a(amiga_keycode[6:0]),
00235     .wren_a(new_ps2 == 1'b0 && amiga_new == 1'b1 && delay == 1'b1),
00236     .data_a(amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b0),
00237     .q_a(pressed)
00238 );
00239 defparam 
00240     pressed_code_inst.operation_mode = "SINGLE_PORT",
00241     pressed_code_inst.width_a = 1,
00242     pressed_code_inst.widthad_a = 7;
00243 
00244 
00245 reg [95:0]  amiga_keycodes;
00246 reg [3:0]   amiga_avail;
00247 reg [7:0]   amiga_keycode;
00248 reg         amiga_new;
00249 reg         caps_lock;
00250 reg         delay;
00251 
00252 reg [2:0]   state;
00253 parameter [2:0]
00254     S_FIRST             = 3'd0,
00255     S_E0                = 3'd1,
00256     S_E0_12             = 3'd2,
00257     S_E0_12_E0          = 3'd3,
00258     S_E0_F0_7C          = 3'd4,
00259     S_E0_F0_7C_E0       = 3'd5,
00260     S_E0_F0_7C_E0_F0    = 3'd6;
00261 
00262 assign keyboard_event       = (new_ps2 == 1'b0 && amiga_new == 1'b0 && keyboard_ready == 1'b1 && amiga_avail > 4'd0);
00263 assign keyboard_scancode    = { amiga_keycodes[94:88], amiga_keycodes[95] };
00264 
00265 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00266     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00267         amiga_keycodes      <= { 8'hFD, 8'hFE, 80'h0 };
00268         amiga_avail         <= 4'd2;
00269         
00270         amiga_new           <= 1'b0;
00271         amiga_keycode       <= 8'd0;
00272         caps_lock           <= 1'b0;
00273         delay               <= 1'b0;
00274         state               <= S_FIRST;
00275         
00276         request_osd         <= 1'b0;
00277         joystick_1_up       <= 1'b0;
00278         joystick_1_down     <= 1'b0;
00279         joystick_1_left     <= 1'b0;
00280         joystick_1_right    <= 1'b0;
00281         joystick_1_fire     <= 1'b0;
00282     end
00283     else begin
00284 
00285         if(new_ps2 == 1'b1) begin
00286             delay <= 1'b0;
00287             
00288             if(state == S_FIRST) begin
00289                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hF0 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b0) begin
00290                     amiga_keycode[7] <= 1'b1;
00291                 end
00292                 else if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hE0) begin
00293                     state <= S_E0;
00294                 end
00295                 else if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h58) begin
00296                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_CAPS };
00297                     
00298                     if(caps_lock == 1'b0 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b1) begin
00299                         amiga_keycode[7] <= 1'b0;
00300                         caps_lock <= 1'b1;
00301                     end
00302                     else if(caps_lock == 1'b1 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b0) begin
00303                         amiga_keycode[7] <= 1'b1;
00304                     end
00305                     else if(caps_lock == 1'b1 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b1) begin
00306                         caps_lock <= 1'b0;
00307                     end
00308                 end
00309                 else begin
00310                     case(kbdat[8:1])
00311                         8'h76:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_ESC };
00312                         8'h05:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F1 };
00313                         8'h06:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F2 };
00314                         8'h04:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F3 };
00315                         8'h0C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F4 };
00316                         8'h03:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F5 };
00317                         8'h0B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F6 };
00318                         8'h83:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F7 };
00319                         8'h0A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F8 };
00320                         8'h01:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F9 };
00321                         8'h09:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F10 };
00322                         8'h78:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_LAMIGA }; //F11
00323                         8'h07:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_RAMIGA }; //F12
00324                         8'h0E:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_APO };
00325                         8'h16:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_1 };
00326                         8'h1E:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_2 };
00327                         8'h26:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_3 };
00328                         8'h25:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_4 };
00329                         8'h2E:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_5 };
00330                         8'h36:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_6 };
00331                         8'h3D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_7 };
00332                         8'h3E:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_8 };
00333                         8'h46:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_9 };
00334                         8'h45:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_0 };
00335                         8'h4E:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_MIN };
00336                         8'h55:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_EQL };
00337                         8'h5D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_BSLA };
00338                         8'h66:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_BACK };
00339                         8'h0D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_TAB };
00340                         8'h15:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_Q };
00341                         8'h1D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_W };
00342                         8'h24:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_E };
00343                         8'h2D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_R };
00344                         8'h2C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_T };
00345                         8'h35:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_Y };
00346                         8'h3C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_U };
00347                         8'h43:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_I };
00348                         8'h44:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_O };
00349                         8'h4D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_P };
00350                         8'h54:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SBRAL };
00351                         8'h5B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SBRAR };
00352                         8'h5A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_ENTER };
00353                         8'h14:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_CTRL };
00354                         8'h1C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_A };
00355                         8'h1B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_S };
00356                         8'h23:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_D };
00357                         8'h2B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_F };
00358                         8'h34:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_G };
00359                         8'h33:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_H };
00360                         8'h3B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_J };
00361                         8'h42:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_K };
00362                         8'h4B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_L };
00363                         8'h4C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SEMIC };
00364                         8'h52:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SQUO };
00365                         8'h12:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_LSHIFT };
00366                         8'h1A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_Z };
00367                         8'h22:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_X };
00368                         8'h21:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_C };
00369                         8'h2A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_V };
00370                         8'h32:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_B };
00371                         8'h31:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_N };
00372                         8'h3A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_M };
00373                         8'h41:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_COMMA };
00374                         8'h49:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_DOT };
00375                         8'h4A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SLA };
00376                         8'h59:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_RSHIFT };
00377                         8'h11:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_LALT };
00378                         8'h7C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_MULT };
00379                         8'h6C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_7 };
00380                         8'h75:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_8 };
00381                         8'h7D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_9 };
00382                         8'h7B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_MIN };
00383                         8'h6B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_4 };
00384                         8'h73:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_5 };
00385                         8'h74:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_6 };
00386                         8'h79:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_PLUS };
00387                         8'h69:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_1 };
00388                         8'h72:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_2 };
00389                         8'h7A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_3 };
00390                         8'h29:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_SPACE };
00391                         8'h70:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_0 };
00392                         8'h71:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_DOT };
00393                         default: begin
00394                             { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00395                             state <= S_FIRST;
00396                         end
00397                     endcase
00398                 end
00399             end
00400             else if(state == S_E0) begin
00401                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hF0 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b0) begin
00402                     amiga_keycode[7] <= 1'b1;
00403                 end
00404                 else if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h12 && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b0) begin
00405                     state <= S_E0_12;
00406                 end
00407                 else if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h7C && amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b1) begin
00408                     state <= S_E0_F0_7C;
00409                 end
00410                 else if( kbdat[8:1] == 8'h6C ||
00411                     (enable_joystick_1 == 1'b1 && (kbdat[8:1] == 8'h14 || kbdat[8:1] == 8'h75 || kbdat[8:1] == 8'h72 || kbdat[8:1] == 8'h6B || kbdat[8:1] == 8'h74)) )
00412                 begin
00413                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h6C) request_osd         <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //home
00414                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h14) joystick_1_fire     <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //right ctrl
00415                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h75) joystick_1_up       <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //up
00416                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h72) joystick_1_down     <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //down
00417                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h6B) joystick_1_left     <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //left
00418                     if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h74) joystick_1_right    <= ~amiga_keycode[7]; //right
00419                     
00420                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00421                     state <= S_FIRST;
00422                 end
00423                 else begin
00424                     case(kbdat[8:1])
00425                         8'h11:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_RALT };
00426                         8'h5B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_LAMIGA }; //left Windows
00427                         8'h5C:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_RAMIGA }; //right Windows
00428                         8'h71:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_DEL };
00429                         8'h75:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_UP };
00430                         8'h6B:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_LEFT };
00431                         8'h72:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_DOWN };
00432                         8'h74:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_RIGHT };
00433                         8'h7D:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_LBRA }; // pageUp
00434                         8'h7A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_RBRA }; // pageDown
00435                         8'h4A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_SLA };
00436                         8'h5A:  { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_NUM_ENTER };
00437                         default: begin
00438                             { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00439                             state <= S_FIRST;
00440                         end
00441                     endcase
00442                 end
00443             end
00444             else if(state == S_E0_12) begin
00445                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hE0) begin
00446                     state <= S_E0_12_E0;
00447                 end
00448                 else begin
00449                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00450                     state <= S_FIRST;
00451                 end
00452             end
00453             else if(state == S_E0_12_E0) begin
00454                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h7C) begin
00455                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_HELP }; // make PrintScreen
00456                 end
00457                 else begin
00458                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00459                     state <= S_FIRST;
00460                 end
00461             end
00462             
00463             else if(state == S_E0_F0_7C) begin
00464                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hE0) begin
00465                     state <= S_E0_F0_7C_E0;
00466                 end
00467                 else begin
00468                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00469                     state <= S_FIRST;
00470                 end
00471             end
00472             else if(state == S_E0_F0_7C_E0) begin
00473                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'hF0) begin
00474                     state <= S_E0_F0_7C_E0_F0;
00475                 end
00476                 else begin
00477                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00478                     state <= S_FIRST;
00479                 end
00480             end
00481             else if(state == S_E0_F0_7C_E0_F0) begin
00482                 if(kbdat[8:1] == 8'h12) begin
00483                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[6:0] } <= { 1'b1, AKC_HELP }; // break PrintScreen
00484                 end
00485                 else begin
00486                     { amiga_new, amiga_keycode[7] } <= 2'b00;
00487                     state <= S_FIRST;
00488                 end
00489             end
00490         end
00491         else if(amiga_new == 1'b1 && delay == 1'b0) begin
00492             delay <= 1'b1;
00493             state <= S_FIRST;
00494         end
00495         else if(amiga_new == 1'b1 && delay == 1'b1) begin
00496             amiga_new <= 1'b0;
00497             amiga_keycode <= 8'd0;
00498             delay <= 1'b0;
00499             
00500             if(pressed == 1'b0 || amiga_keycode[7] == 1'b1) begin
00501             
00502                 if(amiga_avail >= 4'd0 && amiga_avail <= 4'd11)  amiga_avail <= amiga_avail + 4'd1;
00503                 
00504                 case(amiga_avail)
00505                     4'd0:   amiga_keycodes[95:88]   <= amiga_keycode;
00506                     4'd1:   amiga_keycodes[87:80]   <= amiga_keycode;
00507                     4'd2:   amiga_keycodes[79:72]   <= amiga_keycode;
00508                     4'd3:   amiga_keycodes[71:64]   <= amiga_keycode;
00509                     4'd4:   amiga_keycodes[63:56]   <= amiga_keycode;
00510                     4'd5:   amiga_keycodes[55:48]   <= amiga_keycode;
00511                     4'd6:   amiga_keycodes[47:40]   <= amiga_keycode;
00512                     4'd7:   amiga_keycodes[39:32]   <= amiga_keycode;
00513                     4'd8:   amiga_keycodes[31:24]   <= amiga_keycode;
00514                     4'd9:   amiga_keycodes[23:16]   <= amiga_keycode;
00515                     4'd10:  amiga_keycodes[15:8]    <= amiga_keycode;
00516                     4'd11:  amiga_keycodes[7:0]     <= 8'hFA;
00517                 endcase
00518             end
00519         end
00520         else if(keyboard_ready == 1'b1 && amiga_avail > 4'd0) begin
00521             amiga_avail <= amiga_avail - 4'd1;
00522             amiga_keycodes <= { amiga_keycodes[87:0], 8'd0 };
00523         end
00524     end
00525 end
